___WorkingAreaTotal.description: Total size of the working area available to single slot jobs (GB)

___BenchmarkID.description: ID(s) of Benchmarks associated with this ComputingManager

___WorkingAreaShared.description: True if the working area is shared across different ExecutionEnvironments

___WorkingAreaMultiSlotTotal.description: The total size of the working area across all ExecutionEnvironments (GB)

___WorkingAreaLifeTime.description: The minimum guaranteed lifetime of files created in the working area (seconds)

___SlotsUsedByLocalJobs.description: The number of slots currently used by jobs submitted via a non-Grid interface

___ApplicationEnvironmentID.description: ID(s) of ApplicationEnvironments provided by this ComputingManager

___TotalLogicalCPUs.description: The total number of logical CPUs managed by this ComputingManager

___Homogeneous.description: Whether this ComputingManager manages only one type of ExecutionEnvironment

___Reservation.description: Whether advance reservation is supported (no value implies undefined in ExtendedBoolean_t)

___LocalCPUDistribution.description: Classification of the managed ExecutionEnvironments aggregated by the number of logical CPUs

___ApplicationDir.description: The absolute path of a directory available for installation of persistent application software

___ScratchDir.description: The absolute path of a shared directory available for application data

___CacheTotal.description: If local caching of input files is supported, the total size of the area they may be stored in

___WorkingAreaMultiSlotFree.description: The available space in the working area across all ExecutionEnvironments (GB)

___BulkSubmission.description: Whether multiple jobs can be submitted at once (no value implies undefined in ExtendedBoolean_t)

___SlotsUsedByGridJobs.description: The number of slots currently used by jobs submitted via a non-Grid interface

___NetworkInfo.description: The types of internal network connections between ExecutionEnvironments (NetworkInfo_t)

___TotalSlots.description: The total number of slots managed by this ComputingManager

___CacheFree.description: If local caching of input files is supported, the available size of the area they may be stored in

___WorkingAreaGuaranteed.description: True if the job is guaranteed all of WorkingAreaTotal

___WorkingAreaMultiSlotLifeTime.description: The minimum guaranteed lifetime of files created in the working area (seconds)
